---
title: "Disease Trends"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
disease <- read.csv("data/disease_clean.csv")
```

```{r}
disease_nat <- disease %>%
  group_by(Year) %>%
  summarize(Cases = sum(Cases, na.rm = TRUE))

ggplot(disease_nat, aes(Year, Cases)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(
    title = "Vector-Borne Disease Cases in the U.S.",
    x = "Year",
    y = "Reported Cases"
  )
```
